Trade/Device Name(s): Simplexa Bordetella Positive Control Pack MOL2760
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DiaSorin Molecular Simplexa Bordetella Direct and Positive Control Pack using real-time PCR for qualitative detection and differentiation of Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis from nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis nucleic acids from nasopharyngeal swabs of patients with signs and symptoms of Bordetella respiratory infection using the LIAISON MDX instrument; control pack is for use with this assay only.
